title: 160+ extended Amazon Black Friday deals that are better than Prime Day
body_text:
It’s a little like that old saying goes: there’s no party like an Amazon party ’cause an Amazon party don’t stop. And neither does the Amazon Black Friday 2024 sale.
How about a little holiday Q and A?
Q: “How long is Amazon’s Black Friday sale?” A: Amazon’s Black Friday Week has been live all week long, and it continues today! Not only that, but the mega e-tailer will follow up their Black Friday Week sale with rockin’ Cyber Monday deals next week!
How about this one: Q: “Does Amazon do Black Friday?” A: Better than almost anyone else out there, with thousands of dollars of savings to be had across all categories.
Wondering where to find the best Amazon Black Friday laptop deals, Amazon Black Friday TV deals, or the best deals on an Amazon Kindle Black Friday? Then you’ve come to the right place, because below, we’ve rounded up out 140+ favorite Amazon Black Friday deals available this week, featuring huge, doorbuster deals on brands like Apple, Dyson, DeWalt, Shark, Samsung, LEGO, and many, many more.
Below, we’ve rounded up our favorite deals by category. Use the links to navigate to your preferred section, or simply scroll to take in all of what Amazon’s Black Friday has to offer.
Happy shopping!
Best Amazon Black Friday Deals 2024
- Best Black Friday Amazon Apple Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Beauty Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Home Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Travel Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Tool Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Kitchen and Appliance Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Tech and TV Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Gaming Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Clothes Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Fitness Deals
- Best Black Friday Amazon Toy Deals
Best Black Friday Amazon Apple Deals
Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds
The Apple AirPods Pro 2 deliver impressive audio with advanced noise cancellation and a spatial audio feature for an immersive listening experience. They offer a more comfortable fit with customizable silicone tips and an improved H2 chip for enhanced sound quality and longer battery life, perfect for everyday use. Check out our roundup of the best AirPods deals on the internet here.
Beats Studio Pro
The Beats Studio Pro headphones deliver an immersive audio experience with superior sound quality and adaptive noise cancellation. Featuring a sleek design, they offer wireless connectivity and a long-lasting battery life. Built for comfort, these headphones also include intuitive touch controls for effortless navigation, making them perfect for any music lover.
Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm]
The Apple Watch Ultra 2 offers advanced GPS and cellular capabilities, perfect for fitness enthusiasts and adventurers. Its 49mm titanium case is designed for durability and rugged use, with a larger display for improved readability. It includes advanced health tracking features, including heart rate monitoring, blood oxygen levels, and ECG.
Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm]
The Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) delivers essential smartwatch features at an affordable price. With a 40mm display, it offers GPS tracking, heart rate monitoring, and fitness tracking. The watch supports notifications, calls, and messages, while providing all-day battery life. It’s a stylish, reliable option for everyday use.
Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS 42mm case]
The Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS) features a 42mm case and offers enhanced health and fitness features. With a larger display, it supports heart rate monitoring, activity tracking, and notifications right on your wrist. This model is perfect for those looking to track their fitness journey without cellular connectivity.
Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS + Cellular 42mm case]
The Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS + Cellular) with a 42mm case brings ultimate convenience with its cellular connectivity. Stay connected on the go, make calls, stream music, and access apps without needing your phone. It’s perfect for active users who want independence and seamless integration with their Apple ecosystem.
Apple AirPods 4 Wireless Earbuds
Experience seamless audio with Apple AirPods 4, designed for effortless pairing and exceptional sound quality. These wireless earbuds offer active noise cancellation, ensuring immersive listening in any environment. With intuitive touch controls and an ergonomic fit, they provide comfort during extended use. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life with the charging case.
Apple 2024 MacBook Air 13-inch Laptop with M3 chip
The 2024 MacBook Air, powered by the M3 chip, offers improved speed and efficiency. Its 13-inch Retina display provides stunning visuals, while the thin and lightweight design ensures portability. With up to 18 hours of battery life, this laptop is perfect for both work and entertainment without compromising performance.
Apple 2024 MacBook Air 15-inch Laptop with M3 chip
The 2024 MacBook Air 15-inch offers a larger display and M3 chip, combining ample screen space with advanced power. Perfect for productivity and media consumption, this laptop maintains Apple’s signature design with efficient performance and long-lasting battery life.
Beats Solo 4
The Beats Solo 4 wireless headphones offer exceptional sound quality with enhanced bass and a sleek design. Equipped with the Apple H1 chip, they provide seamless pairing with Apple devices, and up to 22 hours of battery life. Their comfortable fit and adjustable headband make them ideal for on-the-go use.
Apple 2022 MacBook Air Laptop with M2 Chip
The Apple 2022 MacBook Air with the M2 chip presents a balanced mix of performance and portability. With improved processing power, a thinner profile, and an excellent Retina display, it’s ideal for professionals and students alike who value efficiency.
Apple 2024 MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 Pro
The 2024 Apple MacBook Pro with the M4 Pro chip offers a boost in performance and graphics power. Ideal for professionals, it provides superior computing speeds, enhanced battery life, and a stunning display, making it suitable for demanding workflows and creative tasks.
Best Black Friday Amazon Beauty Deals
Dyson Airstrait Straightener
The Dyson Airstrait Straightener is an innovative hair styling tool that uses a combination of heated air and advanced airflow technology to straighten hair without extreme heat. It offers quick, frizz-free results, protecting hair from heat damage. Its lightweight design and ergonomic features ensure comfort and ease of use.
RELATED: The very best Black Friday deals
Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer
The Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer offers fast drying with intelligent heat control to prevent damage. Its powerful digital motor and unique design reduce frizz and promote smooth, shiny hair. With multiple heat and speed settings, it’s a must-have for salon-quality styling at home. Perfect for all hair types.
COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer
COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer is a hydrating skincare product designed to repair and rejuvenate skin. Packed with 92% snail mucin, it promotes moisture retention and helps improve skin texture. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly, making it suitable for all skin types, especially dry or damaged skin, leaving it smooth and nourished.
Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects
Brighten your smile with Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, removing years of stains for a whiter smile. Take advantage of Black Friday discounts.
Ralph Lauren Polo Blue Men’s Cologne
Ralph Lauren Polo Blue Men’s Cologne offers a refreshing, invigorating fragrance with notes of melon, cucumber, and tangerine, blended with basil, sage, and thyme. Its light, airy scent exudes masculinity and sophistication, making it ideal for both casual and formal occasions. A timeless, versatile fragrance for modern men.
AquaSonic Aqua Flosser
The AquaSonic Aqua Flosser is a cordless, rechargeable water flosser designed to improve dental health with ease. Featuring multiple jet tips and a portable, waterproof design, it’s perfect for braces, implants, and travel. Take advantage of the 40% off Cyber Weekend deal to simplify your oral care routine and achieve a deeper clean.
AquaSonic DUO PRO Electric Toothbrush Set
The AquaSonic DUO PRO includes two ultra-whitening electric toothbrushes with 40,000 VPM motors, 10 ProFlex brush heads, and a UV sanitizing base for ultimate hygiene. With ADA acceptance and smart timers, it’s perfect for couples or families looking for professional-grade oral care. Cyber Weekend is the ideal time to grab this advanced set at a great value.
Philips Sonicare ProtectiveClean 5300 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
Upgrade your oral care with the Philips Sonicare ProtectiveClean 5300 Electric Toothbrush, featuring three modes and a pressure sensor for healthier gums. Take advantage of Black Friday savings.
TruSkin Vitamin C Serum
TruSkin Vitamin C Serum is designed to rejuvenate and brighten skin, enhancing your natural glow. Formulated with potent antioxidants, it helps reduce signs of aging and uneven skin tone. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly, making it ideal for daily use. This serum supports a youthful complexion, promoting healthier skin overall.
Olay Super Serum
Olay Super Serum is a powerful skincare product designed to visibly reduce wrinkles, fine lines, and uneven skin tone. Formulated with peptides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid, it deeply hydrates and firms the skin. This lightweight serum delivers results quickly, providing a smooth, youthful complexion with consistent use.
COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence
A face cream that uses snail secretion to improve your skin? It might sound weird, but according to reviews, it works! With over 71,000 customer ratings on Amazon, the lightweight serum from COSRX is going viral for its repairing and rejuvenating abilities when it comes to face dryness and fine lines.
Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm Duo
Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm Duo is a versatile skincare solution for lips, face, and body. Made with natural lanolin, it deeply hydrates and nourishes skin, helping to heal dry patches. This set includes two balms that are perfect for on-the-go hydration. Ideal for sensitive, chapped skin.
Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Hyaluronic Acid Cloud Hydra-Gel Under-Eye Patches
These under-eye patches are packed with hyaluronic acid to deliver deep hydration to the delicate eye area. The cloud-like gel texture helps reduce puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines, leaving skin feeling refreshed and smooth. Perfect for a bright, awake look, even after sleepless nights.
Lumineux Sonic Electric Toothbrush
The Lumineux Sonic Electric Toothbrush features advanced sonic technology for a deep, gentle clean that helps remove plaque while being tough on bacteria but gentle on gums. It has multiple cleaning modes and a long-lasting battery, making it a convenient and effective tool for oral health maintenance.
REN Clean Skincare Glow Tonic
REN Clean Skincare Glow Tonic is a gentle exfoliating toner that uses natural fruit acids to brighten and smooth skin. It promotes radiance, minimizes pores, and enhances texture, without harsh chemicals. Free from parabens and sulfates, it’s an excellent choice for sensitive skin in need of a glowing boost.
Living Proof No Frizz Shampoo
Living Proof No Frizz Shampoo is designed to eliminate frizz while adding smoothness and shine to hair. Infused with patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), it repels humidity and helps keep hair looking sleek all day. Safe for color-treated hair, this sulfate-free shampoo cleanses without stripping moisture.
MANSCAPED The Beard Hedger Premium Men’s Beard Trimmer
The Beard Hedger is a high-performance grooming tool tailored to beard care. It features a 20-length setting dial, making it easy to achieve the perfect beard length. With a powerful motor and precision blades, it offers a smooth, comfortable shave. The waterproof design adds convenience for quick trims.
Moon Juice Magnesi-Om
Moon Juice Magnesi-Om is a magnesium supplement designed to promote relaxation and support restful sleep. This blend of magnesium bisglycinate and magnesium citrate helps reduce stress, calm the nervous system, and encourage deep, restorative sleep. A great addition to nightly wellness routines for anyone looking to unwind.
Oral-B iO Deep Clean Rechargeable Electric Powered Toothbrush
The Oral-B iO Deep Clean Rechargeable Toothbrush features cutting-edge artificial intelligence and pressure sensors to guide your brushing technique. It offers real-time feedback and personalized coaching for optimal oral care. With multiple modes and smart features, it ensures a thorough clean while protecting gums and teeth from over-brushing.
Anastasia Beverly Hills Loose Setting Powder
Anastasia Beverly Hills Loose Setting Powder delivers a flawless finish while locking in makeup for long-lasting wear. This finely milled, lightweight powder blurs imperfections and controls shine without settling into fine lines. Available in multiple shades, it sets makeup with a soft-focus effect, ideal for both oily and dry skin.
Anastasia Beverly Hills Lash Genius Conditioning Lash Serum
Lash Genius Conditioning Lash Serum by Anastasia Beverly Hills promotes longer, fuller lashes with regular use. Infused with nourishing ingredients, it strengthens and hydrates lashes, preventing breakage. This serum helps enhance the appearance of lashes naturally over time, delivering a softer, more voluminous look without mascara.
Anastasia Beverly Hills Eyeshadow Palette
The Anastasia Beverly Hills Eyeshadow Palette offers a versatile range of high-quality shades that blend seamlessly. With both matte and shimmer finishes, it allows for endless eye looks, from subtle to dramatic. Known for its rich pigmentation and buildable formula, this palette is ideal for creating custom eye styles.
IGK GOOD BEHAVIOR Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray
IGK GOOD BEHAVIOR Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray is a heat-activated treatment that smooths and protects hair from frizz and humidity. Infused with spirulina protein, it strengthens and restores hair, leaving it silky, shiny, and manageable. This vegan, cruelty-free spray is perfect for those looking to maintain smooth, frizz-free hair.
Lumineux Teeth Whitening Strips
Lumineux Teeth Whitening Strips provide an effective and gentle solution for a brighter smile. These strips are formulated with natural ingredients to safely whiten teeth without causing sensitivity. They adhere firmly to teeth, offering targeted whitening results. Regular use helps maintain a white, healthy smile without harsh chemicals.
SOL DE JANEIRO Mist and Match Hair & Body Perfume Bundle
The Sol de Janeiro Mist and Match Hair & Body Perfume Bundle is a luxurious collection of vibrant, tropical-inspired scents designed to uplift and transport you. Featuring versatile mists for both hair and body, this bundle offers long-lasting, irresistible fragrances that evoke sunny beaches, warm caramel, and exotic florals, perfect for everyday indulgence or layering with matching body creams.
Shark FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System
The Shark FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System is a versatile hair tool that transforms from a powerful hair dryer to a multi-styler with various attachments for curling, volumizing, and smoothing. Featuring no-heat-damage technology and adjustable heat and speed settings, it offers fast drying and styling for all hair types while regulating temperature to minimize heat exposure.
Revlon One Step Volumizer
The Revlon One Step Volumizer PLUS dries and styles hair for an easy, salon-approved blowout. With four different heat settings and a user-friendly handle, this brush will leave you with a shiny, voluminous mane in half the time. Multiple members of our commerce team swear by it.
RELATED: Why the Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer Brush is worth the hype
grace & stella Under Eye Mask
These cooling eye masks are the perfect gift for birthdays, bachelorette parties, or wearing on the couch with your favorite TV show. Add them to your daily skincare routine to brighten, hydrate, and smooth away dark circles, helping you look refreshed and youthful. The gentle, vegan formula is sulfate-free and infused with sea moss to reduce puffiness, target fine lines, and firm the under-eye area.
Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch Original
There’s no question about it — the Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch Original is the only pimple patches we swear by. Not to be too TMI, but it’s so satisfying when all the gunk is drawn from your blemish the next morning.
For more options, check out our expert-backed guide to the best pimple patches.
Youth To The People Superfood Cleanser
One of the most replenishing cleansers is the Youth To The People Superfood Cleanser that’s now 25% off during Cyber Week. It’s an excellent makeup remover in the evenings, too.
Best Black Friday Amazon Home Deals
BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner
The BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner is a compact, powerful cleaning tool designed for tough stains and spills. Its lightweight design, combined with strong suction and stain-fighting formula, makes it ideal for carpets, upholstery, stairs, and even car interiors. Easy to use and portable.
Amazon Basics Suitcase
The Amazon Basics Suitcase offers reliable, budget-friendly luggage with a sleek, durable design. Featuring a hard-shell exterior, smooth-rolling wheels, and an expandable compartment for extra packing space, it provides convenience and practicality for travelers. Available in various sizes, it’s a great option for both short and long trips.
Hatch Restore 2 Sunrise Alarm Clock
The Hatch Restore 2 Sunrise Alarm Clock is a multifunctional bedside device designed to improve your sleep and wake-up experience. Combining a sunrise alarm, customizable sound machine, and dimmable clock, it supports your natural circadian rhythm with gentle light and soothing sounds for a peaceful night’s rest and an energizing morning routine.
Le Creuset Enameled Cast Iron Shallow Round Oven
Le Creuset’s top-rated Enameled Cast Iron Shallow Round Oven has finally gone on sale. For a whopping 41% off, it’s the lowest price we’ve seen this season. The easy-to-clean durable enamel and tight-fitting lid are specially designed to circulate steam and return moisture back to the food — which makes for some perfectly cooked and decadent meals, according to reviewers.
Miele Classic C1 Pure Suction Bagged Canister Vacuum
The Miele Classic C1 Pure Suction Bagged Canister Vacuum is a powerful and versatile cleaning machine, featuring a 1,200-watt Vortex motor system for superior suction and a 29.5-foot cleaning radius for efficient whole-house cleaning. This lightweight, 11-pound vacuum is ideal for low-pile carpets and bare floors, offering a 4.5-liter AirClean FilterBag, adjustable suction settings, and a range of accessories for comprehensive cleaning performance.
Dyson V11 Cordless Stick Vaccum
The Dyson V11 offers powerful suction and intelligent cleaning with its Dynamic Load Sensor system, optimizing suction power across various floor types. Its cordless design and lightweight frame make it versatile and easy to maneuver. The LCD screen displays real-time performance, and its long battery life ensures thorough cleaning. Check out our roundup and reviews of the best vacuum cleaners on the market here.
Shark Upright Navigator Lift-Away Vacuum
For a higher-powered option from Shark, look no further than the Navigator Lift-Away. This tough vacuum comes with a detachable pod that is released from the push of a button to clean above the floor. It’s also designed with anti-allergen technology and a HEPA filter to trapt dust and allergens and leaves you air fresher than ever.
iRobot Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum
The iRobot Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum autonomously cleans floors with advanced navigation and smart mapping. It uses multi-surface brushes and powerful suction to tackle dirt, dust, and debris. Ideal for homes with pets, it can be scheduled, controlled via app, and adapts to various floor types for efficient cleaning.
Dyson V7 Advanced Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner
The Dyson V7 Advanced Cordless Stick Vacuum offers strong suction power in a lightweight design. It features a hygienic bin emptying mechanism and a versatile range of attachments for deep cleaning carpets, upholstery, and hard floors. With up to 30 minutes of runtime, it provides hassle-free, cordless cleaning for any home.
Tineco Floor ONE S5 Smart Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop
The Tineco Floor ONE S5 combines wet and dry cleaning capabilities in one device, allowing simultaneous vacuuming and mopping. It features smart sensors that adjust suction power based on the floor type, ensuring effective cleaning. The cordless design and self-cleaning function offer ease of use and convenience for everyday chores.
roborock Qrevo S Robot Vacuum and Mop
The Roborock Qrevo S Robot Vacuum and Mop is a 2-in-1 cleaning device that vacuums and mops simultaneously. Equipped with advanced LiDAR navigation, it creates precise cleaning maps and efficiently covers every room. With adjustable suction and water flow, it delivers tailored cleaning performance on both carpets and hard floors.
Jackery Solar Generator 300 Plus Portable Power Station with 1X SolarSaga 100W Solar Panel
The Jackery Solar Generator 300 provides portable power on the go. It includes a 100W solar panel for eco-friendly charging and features multiple output options for devices like phones, laptops, and small appliances. Compact and lightweight, it’s an ideal solution for outdoor adventures, camping, or emergency backup power needs.
UGG 16804 Euphoria Plush Faux Fur Reversible Throw Blanket
Snuggle up with the UGG Euphoria Plush Faux Fur Reversible Throw Blanket, offering ultimate softness and style for your home. Available during the Black Friday sales event.
Aura Digital Picture Frame
Share cherished memories with the Aura Digital Picture Frame, featuring a high-resolution display and unlimited photo storage. Available at a special Black Friday price.
Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows
Enhance your sleep experience with the Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows, offering plush comfort and superior support for all sleep positions. Sleep better this season by grabbing this Black Friday offer.
RENPHO Heating Pad for Full Back and Neck Pain Relief
Ease back and neck discomfort with the RENPHO Heating Pad for Full Back and Neck Pain Relief, offering soothing warmth and adjustable settings. Warm up this winter by securing this Black Friday deal.
Scotch Gift Wrap Tape
Prepare for the holiday season with Scotch Gift Wrap Tape, ensuring your presents look flawless with this easy-to-use, invisible adhesive. Stock up during Black Friday deals.
Posca Paint Markers 8-Pack
Unleash your artistic side with the Posca Paint Markers 8-Pack, offering vibrant, opaque colors suitable for multiple surfaces. Get creative this season with Black Friday savings.
TheraGun Relief Handheld Percussion Massage Gun
Relieve muscle tension with the TheraGun Relief Percussion Massage Gun, a portable solution for post-workout recovery. Available now during Black Friday deals.
Chom Chom Roller Pet Hair Remover and Reusable Lint Roller
Keep your home fur-free with the Chom Chom Roller Pet Hair Remover, an eco-friendly tool for tackling pet hair. Get yours during the Black Friday sale.
BrüMate Era 40 oz Tumbler with Handle and Straw
The BrüMate Era 40 oz Tumbler combines superior insulation with a sleek design, perfect for keeping drinks hot or cold. Its durable handle and straw offer convenient, spill-proof sipping, making it ideal for long days outdoors or commuting.
YETI Rambler Tumbler with Handle and Straw Lid
The YETI Rambler Tumbler boasts exceptional performance with double-wall vacuum insulation, ensuring your beverages stay at the right temperature longer. Its sturdy handle and straw lid provide an easy, ergonomic drinking experience, suitable for all adventures and daily use.
ECOVACS DEEBOT T30S Combo Robot Vacuum and Mop
The ECOVACS DEEBOT T30S offers an innovative cleaning solution with its dual-functionality, seamlessly vacuuming and mopping surfaces. Featuring smart mapping technology, it navigates efficiently, adapting to your home’s layout. Its powerful suction and advanced filtration system ensure a thorough clean, while app control provides convenience for on-the-go maintenance.
Blink Outdoor 4 [Newest Model] 3-Camera System
The Blink Outdoor 4 Camera System provides home security with motion detection, HD video quality, and two-way audio. Its wireless design allows for easy installation anywhere, while its long-lasting battery offers months of use. Integrated with Alexa, it offers smart home connectivity, ensuring real-time monitoring and protection for your property.
Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner
The Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe is an effective, portable carpet cleaner designed for homes with pets. It removes tough stains, odors, and dirt from upholstery, carpets, and stairs. Its powerful suction, combined with specialized pet stain formula, tackles messes efficiently, offering convenience and portability for everyday cleaning tasks.
HP Color Laserjet Pro MFP 3301sdw Wireless All-in-One Color Laser Printer
The HP Color Laserjet Pro MFP 3301sdw is a multifunctional printer designed for efficiency. Offering wireless connectivity, it prints, scans, and copies with high-quality color output. Fast performance and a compact footprint make it ideal for home offices. User-friendly features streamline workflow, enhancing productivity while ensuring professional results for all documents.
Shark Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum
The Shark Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum is tailored for pet owners, combining powerful suction with a lightweight design. Its removable battery offers extended runtime, and the specialized brushroll effectively captures pet hair. Easy to maneuver, this vacuum reaches tight spots and transforms into a handheld device for versatile cleaning.
LEVOIT Air Purifier
The LEVOIT Air Purifier ensures clean air in your home with its HEPA filter, which captures 99.97% of allergens and pollutants. Its compact design fits easily into any room, while the quiet operation makes it perfect for bedrooms. Smart features like filter reminders enhance usability and maintain optimal performance.
TOLOCO Massage Gun
The TOLOCO Massage Gun offers customizable massage experiences with multiple speed settings and interchangeable heads. Ideal for muscle recovery, it effectively relieves tension and soreness. Its ergonomic design ensures comfort during use, and the portable size makes it perfect for both home and travel, enhancing overall wellness wherever you go.
EF ECOFLOW Portable Power Station
The EF ECOFLOW Portable Power Station serves as a reliable energy source for outdoor adventures or emergencies. With multiple output ports, it charges various devices simultaneously, from smartphones to small appliances. Its compact design enhances portability, while fast recharging capabilities ensure you’re always powered up and ready to go.
HiLIFE Steamer for Clothes
The HiLIFE Steamer for Clothes provides a quick and efficient way to remove wrinkles from fabrics. Its compact design makes it ideal for home or travel use. The powerful steam penetrates fabric, ensuring a fresh look without the hassle of ironing. Fast heat-up time enhances convenience for busy lifestyles.
Jackery Solar Generator 1000 v2 with 200W Solar Panel
The Jackery Solar Generator 1000 v2 combines powerful performance with eco-friendly energy solutions. It provides reliable off-grid power for camping, emergencies, or outdoor activities. The included 200W solar panel efficiently captures sunlight, ensuring sustainable energy supply. Compact and user-friendly, it’s designed for versatility, enhancing your adventures and peace of mind.
Nectar 12-Inch Queen Mattress
The Nectar 12-Inch Queen Mattress combines support and comfort with its multi-layer construction. Designed for all sleep positions, it features adaptive foam that contours to your body while minimizing motion transfer. With a breathable cover and cooling technology, it enhances sleep quality, providing a restorative experience for restful nights and energized mornings.
Dyson Hot+Cool AM09 Jet Focus Heater and Fan
The Dyson Hot+Cool AM09 Jet Focus Heater and Fan offers year-round climate control with innovative technology. It quickly heats or cools the room, providing a comfortable environment regardless of the season. Sleek and modern in design, it operates quietly and safely, featuring an easy-to-use remote for convenient adjustments at any time.
All-new Ring Battery Doorbell
The All-new Ring Battery Doorbell offers enhanced video quality with a 1080p HD resolution and two-way audio for clear communication. It features a removable battery pack for easy recharging. With motion detection and customizable alerts, it ensures home security while allowing remote access via the Ring app for peace of mind.
Ring Wired Doorbell Pro (Video Doorbell Pro 2)
The Ring Wired Doorbell Pro provides high-definition 1536p video and improved motion detection to enhance your home security. With features like advanced HDR, two-way audio, and customizable motion zones, it allows easy remote monitoring via the Ring app. The sleek, modern design integrates seamlessly into your home’s exterior.
Ring Battery Doorbell Plus
The Ring Battery Doorbell Plus combines high-definition video quality with enhanced motion detection to deliver superior home security. With a 1536p HD video resolution, it captures detailed footage of visitors. The easy-to-install, battery-powered design offers flexibility, and you can monitor live feeds through the Ring app from anywhere.
Frida Baby Thermometer
Frida Baby Thermometer provides quick, accurate temperature readings with a gentle, no-contact infrared sensor. Designed for infants and toddlers, it ensures a hassle-free experience during fever monitoring. The easy-to-read digital display and color-coded indicators help parents assess their child’s temperature at a glance. Ideal for home health care use.
ECOVACS DEEBOT X1 Omni Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo
The ECOVACS DEEBOT X1 Omni offers advanced vacuuming and mopping capabilities in one device. Equipped with intelligent navigation, it efficiently cleans floors while mapping your home’s layout. The integrated mopping system removes dirt and grime, while powerful suction ensures a deep clean. Voice control and app compatibility enhance convenience.
Anker SOLIX F2000 Solar Generator
The Anker SOLIX F2000 Solar Generator offers portable, eco-friendly power solutions for outdoor adventures or emergencies. With a robust capacity, it charges multiple devices simultaneously. Its lightweight design and durable construction make it easy to transport. Compatible with solar panels, it harnesses renewable energy, promoting sustainability while providing reliable electricity whenever needed.
Solo Stove Mesa XL
The Solo Stove Mesa XL is a compact, smokeless tabletop fire pit that creates a warm, inviting ambiance. With its innovative design, it provides efficient heat output with minimal smoke, making it perfect for outdoor gatherings. The stainless steel construction ensures durability, while the portable size suits any space.
Best Black Friday Amazon Travel Deals
Samsonite Omni 2 Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels
The Samsonite Omni 2 Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels is a durable, scratch-resistant suitcase featuring a 100% polycarbonate shell, 360° spinner wheels, and expandable capacity for versatile travel needs. Available in various sizes, it offers TSA-approved locks, a 10-year warranty, and a USB charging port, combining style and functionality for both domestic and international journeys.
trtl Travel Pillow
The trtl Travel Pillow is an innovative neck support designed to provide comfort during long journeys, featuring a unique internal support system wrapped in soft fleece. Its lightweight, compact design makes it easy to pack and carry, offering superior neck and head support compared to traditional U-shaped travel pillows.
Best Black Friday Amazon Tool Deals
DeWalt 20V MAX 5 Ah Lithium Ion Battery 2-Pack
The DeWalt 20V MAX 5 Ah Lithium Ion Battery 2-Pack delivers reliable power for a range of tools. Designed for durability and longevity, these batteries are compatible with all 20V MAX tools. Featuring a built-in fuel gauge, users can easily monitor battery life, enhancing productivity and minimizing downtime on projects. Check out our roundup of the best DeWalt deals available on the internet here.
DeWalt 20V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit, 2 Batteries and Charger Included
The DeWalt 20V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit is a versatile tool for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike. Equipped with two powerful batteries, it ensures uninterrupted work. Its ergonomic design provides comfort during prolonged use, while multiple torque settings allow precise control for various materials, making every project efficient and effective.
LAZYBOI 21V Electric Cordless Leaf Blower
The LAZYBOI 21V Electric Cordless Leaf Blower offers powerful, quiet performance for yard cleaning tasks. Lightweight and easy to maneuver, it provides efficient blowing with its adjustable speed settings. The cordless design, powered by a rechargeable battery, ensures freedom of movement without the hassle of tangled cords or outlets.
DEWALT 20V MAX Impact Driver
The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo offers powerful performance for both drilling and driving tasks. With a high-performance motor, compact design, and two-speed transmission, it delivers versatility and control. The lightweight, ergonomic build reduces fatigue during extended use. Ideal for DIY projects or professional work, it includes two 20V MAX lithium-ion batteries for continuous power.
DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver
The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo offers powerful performance for both drilling and driving tasks. With a high-performance motor, compact design, and two-speed transmission, it delivers versatility and control. The lightweight, ergonomic build reduces fatigue during extended use. Ideal for DIY projects or professional work, it includes two 20V MAX lithium-ion batteries for continuous power.
BOSCH GXL18V-601B25 18V 6-Tool Combo Kit

Your Black Friday & Cyber Monday FAQs, answered by experts
Are Black Friday sales still available?
Good news! Many of the best Black Friday sales have been extended through the weekend. Don’t wait in the cold for stores like Walmart to open and fight the crowds to score the most popular gifts — we found all the deals you can shop from the comfort of your own home.
When is Cyber Monday 2025?
Kick off December with the online shopping sale of the year on Monday, December 1, 2025.
Which is better: Black Friday or Cyber Monday?
It depends! Black Friday shoppers may benefit from higher inventory on sell-out-risk items, while Cyber Monday may bring steeper discounts and incentives — depending on where you shop. We recommend making a strategic plan to maximize your savings without missing out on the items you want the most.
When is Travel Tuesday 2025?
Jet-setters rejoice: Travel Tuesday, with its great deals on flights, hotels, cruises, all-inclusives and more, will take place on Tuesday, December 2, 2025.
Is it worth it?
Absolutely! Black Friday and Cyber Monday bring some of the biggest sales of the year on big-ticket tech items such as AirPods, popular gifts like the Dyson Airwrap, clothing and shoes, top kids toys, and so much more.
Where can I find the best deals?
Right here! Follow Post Wanted shopping insiders for updates on all the Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday deals worth shopping in 2025.
